overview: In 2020, Zeming receives a phone call in Taiwan informing him that his mother, Jia’en, has passed on. After returning to Singapore, he regrets not spending quality time with his mother and begs for a chance to start over. After meeting with a fateful car accident, he successfully travels back in time to 2015 and is determined to not repeat his mistakes again. However, his attempt later proves to be futile as he is forced to face the reality of fate again.
title: Restart
